summary: The diff shows modifications only to backend/main.mo and project_state.json. Neither of the required Candid declaration files (.did, .did.js, .did.d.ts) appear in the diff, indicating that the core requirements to regenerate and synchronize Candid declarations have not been implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Regenerate the backend Candid interface declarations (.did file) to include the clearBoardroom method
missing_requirements.reason: No .did file changes appear in the diff. The backend Candid declarations were not regenerated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Synchronize the frontend Candid declarations (.did.js and .did.d.ts files) so that the React app can recognize and call the clearBoardroom method
missing_requirements.reason: No .did.js or .did.d.ts file changes appear in the diff. The frontend Candid declarations were not synchronized.

hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly states 'Do NOT modify backend/main.mo' as a constraint, yet backend/main.mo appears in the modified files list
The BuildRequest does not request any changes to project state tracking or metadata files. Only Candid declaration regeneration was requested.
